thread.title: Yvonne French

author: Yvonne French
title: Yvonne French
text: The online ordering was easy to use and the garments arrived in advance of the estimated delivery date provided even though we live in France. Very pleased with the garments and the appearance of my printed logo. We will be wearing them proudly at the Trade Show in Reims next weekend. Thank you for the courteous service from your Customer Support staff when I had a little wobble about their arrival timing. Highly recommended!
